SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `game_server` s WHERE v.`ip` = s.`host` AND s.`outdated` = 0) AS game_server_num, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(s.`id`) FROM `game_server` s WHERE v.`ip` = s.`host` AND s.`outdated` = 0) AS game_server_ids, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `game_server_group` g WHERE v.`ip` = g.`host`) AS cross_server_num, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(g.`id`) FROM `game_server_group` g WHERE v.`ip` = g.`host`) AS cross_server_ids, v.* FROM `game_vps` v
AND v.`name` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{entity.name}, '%')
AND v.`hostname` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{entity.hostname}, '%')
AND v.`ip` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{entity.ip}, '%')
AND v.`lan` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{entity.lan}, '%')
AND v.`os` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{entity.os}, '%')
AND v.`create_time` >= #{createTimeRange.start} AND v.`create_time` <= #{createTimeRange.end}
GROUP BY v.`ip` ORDER BY v.`id`
